original: tatra kasyacid ekasya vaśe viśvaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: tatra kasyacid ekasya vaśe viśvam pravartate

original: iti sādhayituṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ pracakṣmahe // YIs_1 //
analyzed: iti sādhayitum pūrvam pūrvapakṣam pracakṣmahe

original: tatra mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ nāyaṃ sarvārthadarśanaśaktisampannaḥ puruṣo 'bhyupagamam arhati,
analyzed: tatra mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ na ayam sarva artha darśana śakti sampannaḥ puruṣaḥ abhyupagamam arhati
atipatita sakala sādhaka pramāṇa sambhāvanā bhūmi tvāt sphuṭa vividha bādhaka tvāt ca

original: tathā hi asya pratyakṣam anyad vā sādhakaṃ bhavet ?
analyzed: tathā hi asya pratyakṣam anyat vā sādhakam bhavet
pratyakṣam api laukikam yaugikam vā
vyavasthita mita sva artham na tāvat iha laukikam
sādhanam tena sarva artha tad jñāna ādeḥ asiddhitaḥ

original: sarvārthadarśanaśaktiśālinam avagamayatā hi deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣavyavadhānajuṣaḥ sarva evārthās darśanaṃ śaktiś ca gocarayitavyāni /
analyzed: sarva artha darśana śakti śālinam avagamayatā hi deśa kāla svabhāva viprakarṣa vyavadhāna juṣaḥ sarve eva arthāḥ darśanam śaktiḥ ca gocarayitavyāni

original: na ca vidyamānendriyasannikarṣayogyakatipayaviṣayaniyatavṛtter laukikapratyakṣasya niravadhir ayaṃ mahimā saṃbhāvanābhūmir iti katham iva tad  #
analyzed: na ca vidyamāna indriya sannikarṣa yogya katipaya viṣaya niyata vṛtteḥ laukika pratyakṣasya niravadhiḥ ayam mahimā saṃbhāvanā bhūmiḥ iti katham iva tat  /
iha sādhanam iti manyemahi
nā api yogi pratyakṣam asya sādhakam yatas
pratyakṣa tve tat api evam vidyamāna eka gocaram
bhūta ādi gocaram nā eva pratyakṣam pratibhā ādi vat

original: tat khalu yogivijñānam aindriyakaṃ na vā ?
analyzed: tat khalu yogi vijñānam aindriyakam na vā
aindriyakam api bahis indriya sambhavam āntara karaṇa janitam vā

original: bahirindriyāṇi tāvat samadhigatanijaviṣayasannikarṣasahakārīṇi tadgocarajñānajananānīti jagati viditam /
analyzed: bahis indriyāṇi tāvat samadhigata nija viṣaya sannikarṣa sahakārīṇi tad gocara jñāna jananāni iti jagati viditam
atas na rasanā ādibhiḥ ajāta ativṛtta vyavahita ādi sakala viṣaya vedana prasaṅgaḥ
na ca avidyamānaiḥ ajāta ādibhiḥ saṃbhavati sannikarṣaḥ
tasya hi āśraya tvāt āśraya abhāve tad asambhavāt
atas pekṣitaḥ rtha sannikarṣaḥ
sahakāri virahe katham indriyāṇi atīta ādi viṣaya sākṣātkārāya kalperan
bhavati ca yat yat sahakāri yat kārya jananam
tat tad abhāve na tat janayati
yathā kṣiti salila sahakāri aṅkura kārya janana bījam kṣiti ādi abhāve ṅkuram

original: arthasannikarṣasahakārīṇi bahirindriyāṇi jñānajananānīti tāny api nātīte 'nāgate vārthe jñānaṃ janayantīti na tad upajanitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yathoktaviṣayaniyamam  #
analyzed: artha sannikarṣa sahakārīṇi bahis indriyāṇi jñāna jananāni iti tāni api na atīte na agate vā arthe jñānam janayanti iti na tat upajanitam pratyakṣam yathā ukta viṣaya niyamam
atikrāmati
na api antara karaṇa sambhavam
āntara gocare eva sukha ādau svānta svātantryāt

original: bāhyaviṣayamitiṣu ca manaso niraṅkuśakaraṇatāṅgīkāre hi kṛtaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ /
analyzed: bāhya viṣaya mitiṣu ca manasaḥ niraṅkuśa karaṇa tā aṅgīkāre hi kṛtam cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ

original: ataś ca kaścid andho badhiro vā bhavet /
analyzed: atas ca kaścid andhaḥ badhiraḥ vā bhavet

original: bhavati cātra vimatipadaṃ mano bahirindriyanirapekṣaṃ na bāhyapratyakṣagocare pravartate,
analyzed: bhavati ca atra vimati padam manaḥ bahis indriya nirapekṣam na bāhya pratyakṣa gocare pravartate
tatra tad tantra vṛtti tvāt

original: yady atra yattantravṛtti na tat tannirapekṣaṃ tatra pravartate,
analyzed: yadi atra yat tantra vṛtti na tat tad nirapekṣam tatra pravartate
yathā loka apekṣa pravṛtti cakṣuḥ sva gocare ndha tamasaḥ iti

original: na ca siddhāuṣadhamantratapaḥsamādhimahimasamāsāditātiśayānīndriyāṇi kadācid apajahati samadhigataviṣayaniyamam iti sambhavati;
analyzed: na ca siddha auṣadha mantra tapaḥ samādhi mahima samāsādita atiśayāni indriyāṇi kadācid apajahati samadhigata viṣaya niyamam iti sambhavati
sāṃsiddhika sāma artha āvirbhāva eka phala tvāt teṣām
sāmarthyasya ca pratiniyamāt

original: na khalu suprayuktabheṣajaśatavihitasaṃskāram api śrotraṃ rūparasavibhāvāvagamāya kalpate /
analyzed: na khalu su prayukta bheṣaja śata vihita saṃskāram api śrotram rūpa rasa vibhāva avagamāya kalpate
bhavati ca vivāda adhyāsita bāhya abhyantara karaṇa pāṭava atiśayaḥ
aindriyaka prakarṣa tvāt

original: dṛśyamānatatprakarṣavad ity aindriyakaṃ jñānaṃ nātītādi gocarayati /
analyzed: dṛśyamāna tad prakarṣa vat iti aindriyakam jñānam na atīta ādi gocarayati

original: bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanas tu saty api viśadanirbhāsatve prācyānubhavagocarād
analyzed: bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta janmanaḥ tu sati api viśada nirbhāsa tve prācya anubhava gocarāt
anadhikam adhikam vā adhyavasyataḥ smṛti vibhrama srotasoḥ anyatara āvarta parivartinaḥ
kutas prāmāṇya kūla pratilabhaḥ
kutastarām ca pratyakṣa tayā uttambhanam

original: pratyakṣasya vā sataḥ katham iva viditaviṣayaniyamavyatikramaḥ ?
analyzed: pratyakṣasya vā sataḥ katham iva vidita viṣaya niyama vyatikramaḥ

original: atikrāmato vā kutaḥ pratyakṣatvam iti na viśvānubhavāiśvaryaśālini pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: atikrāmataḥ vā kutas pratyakṣa tvam iti na viśva anubhava aiśvarya śālini pratyakṣam pramāṇam
na api pramāṇa antaram
tat khalu anumānam āgamaḥ vā

original: anumānam api viśeṣato dṛṣṭaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ vā ?
analyzed: anumānam api viśeṣataḥ dṛṣṭam sāmānyataḥ dṛṣṭam vā

original: tatra sakalapadavīdavīyasi bhavati na tāvat svalakṣaṇasākṣātkārapūrvakāvinābhāvāvadhāraṇādhīnodayatvād idam anumānam udetum alam /
analyzed: tatra sakala padavī davīyasi bhavati na tāvat sva lakṣaṇa sākṣātkāra pūrvaka avinābhāva avadhāraṇa adhīna udaya tvāt idam anumānam udetum alam

original: na hy anavagatacarahutabhujas tadavinābhāvitayā dhūmam anusandhātum īśate /
analyzed: na hi anavagata cara hutabhujaḥ tad avinābhāvi tayā dhūmam anusandhātum īśate

original: na ca sarvārthanirmāṇasākṣātkārapaṭīyasi liṅgaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭam api kiñcana labhate /
analyzed: na ca sarva artha nirmāṇa sākṣātkāra paṭīyasi liṅgam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam api kiñcana labhate
nanu eka cetanā adhīnam vivāda adhyāsitam jagat
acetanena anārabdha tvāt aroga sva śarīra vat
tathā sarva artha nirmāṇa sākṣātkaraṇa kauśalam

original: kāryatvād eva jagatas tatkartur anumīyatām // YIs_5 //
analyzed: kārya tvāt eva jagataḥ tad kartuḥ anumīyatām
sarvam hi kāryam upādāna upakaraṇa sampradāna prayojana saṃvedi cetana racitam avagatam ghaṭa maṇika gṛha ādi

original: kāryaṃ ca vimatipadam avanigirimahārṇavādīti tad api tathāvidhabuddhimaddhetukam adhyavasīyate /
analyzed: kāryam ca vimati padam avani giri mahā arṇava ādi iti tat api tathāvidha buddhimat hetukam adhyavasīyate

original: na ca kāryatvam asiddham iti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca kāryatvam asiddham iti vācyam
avayava sanniveśa ādibhiḥ hetubhiḥ tad siddheḥ

original: iha cānyāvayavibhyaḥ prabhṛti ādvyaṇukam akhilam avayavi kramanihīyamānanānāvayavavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣajanitam avagatam ity antata upādānaṃ caturvidhāḥ  #
analyzed: iha ca anya avayavibhyaḥ prabhṛti ā dvyaṇukam akhilam avayavi krama nihīyamāna nānā avayava vyatiṣaṅga viśeṣa janitam avagatam iti antatas upādānam caturvidhāḥ
paramāṇavaḥ prapañcasya

original: teṣām ādiparispandasya tadanuguṇādṛṣṭaviśiṣṭatattatkṣetrajñasaṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇaka iti upakaraṇam api samastakṣetrajñavartini dharmādharmalakṣaṇāny  #
analyzed: teṣām ādi parispandasya tad anuguṇa adṛṣṭa viśiṣṭa tad tad kṣetrajña saṃyoga asamavāyi kāraṇakaḥ iti upakaraṇam api samasta kṣetrajña vartini dharma adharma lakṣaṇāni
adṛṣṭāni
prayojanam punar tad abhinirvartita vicitra arthakriyā kāraḥ
tad upabhujaḥ te eva kṣetrajñāḥ sampradānam

original: na cāmī svasamavāyināv api dharmādharmāvalam avalokayitum iti tadatirekī nikhilabhuvananirmāṇanipuṇo
analyzed: na ca amī sva samavāyinau api dharma adharmau alam avalokayitum iti tad atirekī nikhila bhuvana nirmāṇa nipuṇaḥ

original: puruṣadhaureyakaḥ kim iti na sāmānyatodṛṣṭaliṅgād anumīyate ?
analyzed: puruṣa dhaureyakaḥ kim iti na sāmānyatodṛṣṭa liṅgāt anumīyate

original: tad idam aviditānumānavṛttasya svamatiracitataralatarkollasitam iti parihasanti mīmāṃsakāḥ /
analyzed: tat idam avidita anumāna vṛttasya sva mati racita tarala tarka ullasitam iti parihasanti mīmāṃsakāḥ

original: tathā hi kim idam ekacetanādhīnatvaṃ nāmābhipretaṃ tanubhuvanādeḥ ? /
analyzed: tathā hi kim idam eka cetanā adhīna tvam nāma abhipretam tanu bhuvana ādeḥ
tad āyatta tvam iti ced

original: kim asya tasminn āyattaṃ kiṃ nu janmātha vā sthitiḥ /
analyzed: kim asya tasmin āyattam kim nu janma atha vā sthitiḥ

original: pravṛttir vādyayos tāvat sādhyahīnaṃ nidarśanam // YIs_6 //
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ vādyayoḥ tāvat sādhya hīnam nidarśanam
na khalu śarīram eka cetanā adhīna utpatti sthiti
ye hi yad deha adhīna sukha duḥkha upabhoga bhāginaḥ

original: bhavati hi taducitādṛṣṭaśālināṃ sarveṣām eva teṣāṃ taddehina iva tadutpattisthitinimittatvam /
analyzed: bhavati hi tad ucita adṛṣṭa śālinām sarveṣām eva teṣām tat dehinaḥ iva tad utpatti sthiti nimitta tvam

original: api ca śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavāyalakṣaṇā sthitir avayavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣād ṛte na cetayitāraṃ param apekṣate /
analyzed: api ca śarīra avayavinaḥ sva avayava samavāya lakṣaṇā sthitiḥ avayavi atiṣaṅga viśeṣāt ṛte na cetayitāram param apekṣate
yā punar tad apekṣiṇī prāṇana lakṣaṇā sthitiḥ

original: na sā pakṣīkṛte kṣityādau sambhavatīti sthitim api naikarūpāṃ pakṣasapakṣānuyāyinīm udīkṣāmahe /
analyzed: na sā pakṣīkṛte kṣiti ādau sambhavati iti sthitim api nā ekarūpām pakṣa sapakṣa anuyāyinīm udīkṣāmahe
eka cetanā adhīna pravṛtti tve tu prabala bahu jana sarabhasa prayatna pracālyaiḥ upala taru ratha ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ
ārabdha tvāt eva ca etat sādhya siddhau adhikam idam upādāna viśeṣa vacanam
siddha sādhya tā

original: cetanair bhoktṛbhir bhogyaḥ karmabhir janyate hi naḥ // YIs_7 //
analyzed: cetanaiḥ bhoktṛbhiḥ bhogyaḥ karmabhiḥ janyate hi naḥ

original: yuktaṃ caitat yadubhayavādisiddhānām eva cetanānāṃ kartṛtvābhyupagamaḥ; lāghavāt /
analyzed: yuktam ca etat yat ubhaya vādi siddhānām eva cetanānām kartṛ tva abhyupagamaḥ lāghavāt
na ca upādāna ādi anabhijña tayā tad pratikṣepaḥ
upādānam pṛthivī ādi yāga dāna ādi sādhanam

original: sākṣātkartuṃ kṣamante yat sarva eva ca cetanāḥ // YIs_8 //
analyzed: sākṣātkartum kṣamante yat sarve eva ca cetanāḥ

original: adyavad eva viśvambharādayaḥ kramaprāptāgantukopacayāpacayaikadeśaśālino na yugapad eva niravaśeṣavilayajananabhāgina ityantimaparamāṇusākṣātkāro  #
analyzed: adya vat eva viśvambharā ādayaḥ krama prāpta āgantuka upacaya apacaya eka deśa śālinaḥ na yugapad eva niravaśeṣa vilaya janana bhāginaḥ iti antima paramāṇu sākṣātkāraḥ
na kartṛ bhāva upayogī
karmaṇaḥ śakti rūpam yat pūrva ādi pada āspadam

original: mā bhūt pratyakṣatā tasya śaktimad dhy akṣagocaraḥ // YIs_9 //
analyzed: mā bhūt pratyakṣa tā tasya śaktimat hi akṣa gocaraḥ

original: na khalu kulālādayaḥ kumbhādikāryam ārabhamāṇās tadupādānopakaraṇabhūtamṛddaṇḍacakrādikāryotpādanaśaktiṃ sākṣātkṛtya tat tad ārabhante /
analyzed: na khalu kulāla ādayaḥ kumbha ādi kāryam ārabhamāṇāḥ tad upādāna upakaraṇa bhūta mṛd daṇḍa cakra ādi kārya utpādana śaktim sākṣātkṛtya tat tat ārabhante

original: yadi paraṃ śaktim aviduṣām abhilaṣitasādhane tadupādānādivyavahāro 'nupapannaḥ, iha tu
analyzed: yadi param śaktim aviduṣām abhilaṣita sādhane tad upādāna ādi vyavahāraḥ iha tu
āgamāt avagamyante vicitrāḥ karma śaktayaḥ

original: tena karmabhir ātmānaḥ sarvaṃ nirmimatāṃ pṛthak // YIs_10 //
analyzed: tena karmabhiḥ ātmānaḥ sarvam nirmimatām pṛthak

original: api ca tad eva cetanakarṭrkaṃ jagati paridṛśyate,
analyzed: api ca tat eva cetana karṭrkam jagati paridṛśyate
yat eva śakya kriyam śakya jñāna upādāna ādi ca

original: na ca tathā mahīmahīśvaramahārṇavādīti katham iva tattatkāryatvam ?
analyzed: na ca tathā mahī mahīśvara mahā arṇava ādi iti katham iva tad tad kāryatvam
kathantarām ca tad upādāna upakaraṇa ādeḥ sākṣātkāra gocara tā

original: yādṛśaṃ hi kāryam upādānādyabhijñapūrvakam avagataṃ ghaṭamaṇikādi,
analyzed: yādṛśam hi kāryam upādāna ādi abhijña pūrvakam avagatam ghaṭa maṇika ādi
tādṛśam eva hi tathāvidha buddhimat hetuka tva anumānāya prabhavati

original: api cānīśvareṇa parimitaśaktijñānena vigrahavatānavāptakāmena kṛtam avagataṃ ghaṭādikāryam
analyzed: api ca anīśvareṇa parimita śakti jñānena vigrahavatā anavāpta kāmena kṛtam avagatam ghaṭa ādi kāryam

original: iti tathāvidhaṃ boddhāram upasthāpayan hetur abhimatapuruṣasārvajñyasarvāiśvaryādiviparyayasādhanādiviruddhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: iti tathāvidham boddhāram upasthāpayan hetuḥ abhimata puruṣa sārvajñya sarva aiśvarya ādi viparyaya sādhana ādi viruddhaḥ syāt
na ca evam sati sarva anumāna vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ śaṅkitavyaḥ

original: pramāṇāntaragocare hi liṅgini liṅgabalād āpatato viparītaviśeṣāṃs tatpramāṇam eva pratiruṇaddhi /
analyzed: pramāṇa antara gocare hi liṅgini liṅga balāt āpatataḥ viparīta viśeṣān tat pramāṇam eva pratiruṇaddhi

original: iha punar atipatitasakalamānāntarakarmabhāve sarvanirmāṇanipuṇe siṣādhayiṣite yāvanto 'nvayavyatirekāvadhāritāvinābhāvabhājo dharmās tān apy  #
analyzed: iha punar atipatita sakala māna antara karma bhāve sarva nirmāṇa nipuṇe siṣādhayiṣite yāvantaḥ nvaya vyatireka avadhārita avinābhāva bhājaḥ dharmāḥ tān api
a viśeṣeṇa upasthāpayati
api ca
sva artha kāruṇya bhāvena vyāptāḥ prekṣāvataḥ kriyāḥ
īśvarasya ubhaya abhāvāt jagat sargaḥ na yujyate
avāpta kāma tvāt na tāvat ātma arthe sṛjati
pralaya samaye pralīna sakala karaṇa kalevara ādi bhoga upakaraṇa tayā ca cetanānām duḥkha abhāvāt
duḥkhi darśana janita kṛpā prayuktiḥ api nā asti iti vyāpaka bhūta svārtha kāruṇya nivṛtteḥ vyāpya bhūtayā
prekṣāvat pravṛttyā api nivartitavyam
sukha ekatānam janayet jagat karuṇayā sṛjan
tad karma anuvidhāyi tve hīyeta asya svatantra tā

original: na copādānādisākṣātkāriṇi eva kartṛtvam ity api niyamaḥ;
analyzed: na ca upādāna ādi sākṣātkāriṇi eva kartṛ tvam iti api niyamaḥ

original: upādānam upakaraṇaṃ cāviduṣa evātmano jñānādiṣu kartṛtvāt / ataḥ
analyzed: upādānam upakaraṇam ca a viduṣaḥ eva ātmanaḥ jñāna ādiṣu kartṛ tvāt atas
asiddha tvāt viruddha tvāt anaikāntyāt ca varṇitāt
kārya tva hetoḥ jagataḥ na yathā udita kartṛ tā

original: prayogaś ca bhavati mahīmahīdharādi kāryaṃ na bhavati,
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca bhavati mahī mahīdhara ādi kāryam na bhavati
prasiddha kārya vilakṣaṇa tvāt
gagana vat aśakya darśana upādāna upakaraṇa tvāt vā
vyatirekeṇa ghaṭa ādi vat
paramāṇavaḥ na pratyakṣāḥ niratiśaya sūkṣma dravya tvāt
tathā eva ghaṭa ādi vat
vimati viṣayaḥ kāle na loka śūnyaḥ
kāla tvāt idānīntana kāla vat

original: tanubhuvanādīśvarakartṛkaṃ na bhavati kāryatvāt tadvad eva /
analyzed: tanu bhuvanāt īśvara kartṛkam na bhavati kāryatvāt tadvat eva

original: īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati prayojanarahitatvād aśarīratvād vā muktātmavad iti /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati prayojana rahita tvāt aśarīra tvāt vā muktātma vat iti

original: atra brūmo na kāryatvaṃ kṣityādau śakyanihnavam /
analyzed: atra brūmaḥ na kāryatvam kṣiti ādau śakya nihnavam
sa bhāga tvāt kriyāvat tvāt mahat tvena viśeṣitāt
tādṛśāt eva mūrta tvāt bāhya pratyakṣa tā anvitāt
na ca īdṛśaḥ eva sanniveśaḥ kāryaḥ
na itare iti avayava sanniveśa viśeṣa pratiniyatam rūpa bhedam udīkṣāmahe

original: yat tu śakyakriyaṃ śakyajñānopādānopakaraṇaṃ ca kriyata iti,
analyzed: yat tu śakya kriyam śakya jñāna upādāna upakaraṇam ca kriyate iti
tat astu nāma

original: kin tu te kriyājñānaśaktī kriyājñānābhyām eva samadhigamanīye /
analyzed: kin tu te kriyā jñāna śaktī kriyā jñānābhyām eva samadhigamanīye

original: te ca kṣityādiṣu yathoktasādhanabalasamupasthāpite iti na viśeṣaḥ prasiddhaprākāragopurādikāryebhyas tanubhuvanādeḥ /
analyzed: te ca kṣiti ādiṣu yathā ukta sādhana bala samupasthāpite iti na viśeṣaḥ prasiddha prākāra gopura ādi kāryebhyaḥ tanu bhuvana ādeḥ

original: na caitāvān eva kriyāgocara iti viṣayaniyamaḥ kaścit kriyāyā dṛṣṭaḥ;
analyzed: na ca etāvān eva kriyā gocaraḥ iti viṣaya niyamaḥ kaścid kriyāyāḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
yena idam a śakya kriyam adhyavasyema

original: siddhe ca kāryatve tadupādānādisakṣātkaraṇatadadhiṣṭhānatatpreraṇanipuṇaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ sidhyaty eva /
analyzed: siddhe ca kārya tve tad upādāna ādi sakṣāt karaṇa tad adhiṣṭhāna tad preraṇa nipuṇaḥ puruṣa viśeṣaḥ sidhyati eva
adhiṣṭhānam ca tad pravṛtti anuguṇa saṅkalpa vat īśvara sannikarṣaḥ
kṣetrajñena iva sva śarīra ādau
sa ca dravyaiḥ saṃyoga lakṣaṇaḥ
tad guṇaiḥ tu saṃyukta samavāya rūpaḥ
pravṛttiḥ ca paramāṇūnām parispanda lakṣaṇā
tābhyām dharma adharmābhyām eva phalam
cetanā anadhiṣṭhitānām sarveṣām eteṣām acaitanyena akiñcitkara tvāt

original: na hi cetanena vardhakinānadhiṣṭhitā vāsī deśakālādisahakāriśatasamadhigame 'pi yūpādīny upādayitum alam /
analyzed: na hi cetanena vardhakinā anadhiṣṭhitā vāsī deśa kāla ādi sahakāri śata samadhigame pi yūpa ādīni alam

original: bījāṅkurādayas tu pakṣāntarbhūtā iti tair vyabhicāravacanam anabhijñatayaiva śrotriyāṇām /
analyzed: bīja aṅkura ādayaḥ tu pakṣa antar bhūtāḥ iti taiḥ vyabhicāra vacanam anabhijña tayā eva śrotriyāṇām
etena sukha ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ pratyuktaḥ
na ca ubhaya vādi siddha tā mātreṇa kṣetrajñānām evā īdṛśa adhiṣṭhātṛ tva kalpanam ucitam
teṣām sūkṣma vyavahita ādi darśana aśakteḥ niścita tvāt
dṛṣṭa anusāriṇī hi sarvatra kalpanā
na dṛṣṭa virodhinī
na ca evam īśvarasya aśaktiḥ niścitā
pramāṇa antarataḥ tad siddheḥ
yathā udita pramāṇa balena sidhyan sāṃsiddhika sarva artha darśana tad preraṇa śakti sampannaḥ eva sidhyati
kāryatvasya samartha kartṛ pūrvaka tvena pratibandhāt
yat tu parimita śakti jñāna anaiśvarya ādi āpādanāt dharma viśeṣa viparīta sādhanatvam udbhāvitam
tat atisthavīyaḥ
aprayojaka tvāt teṣām

original: na hi kiñcit kriyamāṇaṃ kartur arthāntaraviṣayam asāmarthyam ajñānaṃ vā svotpattaye 'pekṣate;
analyzed: na hi kiñcid kriyamāṇam kartuḥ artha antara viṣayam asāmarthyam ajñānam vā sva utpattaye pekṣate
sva sampādana samartha kartṛ mātra ākṣepāt kevala vyatireka asiddheḥ
tāvatā eva upapadyamāne kārya udaye kiñcitkarasya artha antara viṣayasya abhāvasya hetu tva kalpanā anupapatteḥ

original: api ca kiṃ taditarasamastavastuviṣayam ajñānādi vyāpakam,
analyzed: api ca kim tad itara samasta vastu viṣayam ajñāna ādi vyāpakam
uta katipaya gocaram iti vivecanīyam
na tāvat aśeṣa viṣayam
anupalabdheḥ

original: na khalu kumbhakāraḥ kumbhātireki kim api na vijānāti /
analyzed: na khalu kumbhakāraḥ kumbha atireki kim api na vijānāti
atha katipaya viṣayam

original: tad api na, aniyataviṣayatayā tasya tasya vyabhicāradarśanāt /
analyzed: tat api na aniyata viṣaya tayā tasya tasya vyabhicāra darśanāt

original: na khalu śarīraviśiṣṭas sann evāyam ātmā śarīram upādatte,

original: pūrvadehaparityāgena dehāntaraprāpakakarmapreritaprāṇasahāya eva dehāntaraṃ praviśatīty upapāditam ātmacintāyām /

analyzed: kiñcid ātmā śarīram adhitiṣṭhataḥ dhiṣṭhāna kriyā karma bhūtasya dehasya adhiṣṭhātṛ daśa deha
anupraveśaḥ n upapannaḥ

original: adhitiṣṭhāsitadehasaṃyogavata eva tatpravṛttyanuguṇaprayatnayogalakṣaṇam adhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭam iti cet;
analyzed: adhitiṣṭhā sita deha saṃyogavataḥ eva tad pravṛtti anuguṇa prayatna yoga lakṣaṇam adhiṣṭhānam dṛṣṭam iti ced
astu ekatattvastva
sambaddhasya adhiṣṭhāna anupapatteḥ prerya vastu sambandhinā prerakeṇa bhavitavyam iti

original: na yato 'nyad apy adhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ mānadaṇḍādi svasambandhinaivādhiṣṭhīyate /
analyzed: na yatas nyat api adhiṣṭhīyamānam māna daṇḍa ādi sva sambandhinā eva adhiṣṭhīyate
tena adhiṣṭhāna kriyā apekṣita adhiṣṭheya padārtha sambandha mātra atirekeṇa deha sambandhaḥ nāma aparaḥ na ādartavyaḥ

original: asti ceśvarasyāpi jagadupādānopakaraṇais sambandha ity uktam eva /

atha sva deha vyatirikte vastuni pravṛtti viśeṣa karatvam deha dvāreṇa eva

original: manaso nityendriyatayā dehāpagame 'pi sambandhābhyupagamād anaikāntikaś ca /

original: prādeśikaśarīrakaḥ kiñcijjñaḥ puṇyapāpaparavaśagatir alaṃ nirmāṇāyety aparimitajñānāiśvaryaśaktiḥ
analyzed: prādeśika śarīrakaḥ kiñcid jñaḥ puṇya pāpa para vaśa gatiḥ alam nirmāṇāya iti aparimita jñāna aiśvarya śaktiḥ

original: śarīrādyanapekṣaḥ saṅkalpād eva sakalabhuvananirmāṇakṣamaḥ kartā siddhaḥ /
analyzed: śarīra ādi anapekṣaḥ saṅkalpāt eva sakala bhuvana nirmāṇa kṣamaḥ kartā siddhaḥ

original: īdṛśena kartrā ghaṭādiṣu kāryatvasya sambandho na dṛṣṭa iti cet;
analyzed: īdṛśena kartrā ghaṭa ādiṣu kāryatvasya sambandhaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti ced

original: atigahanagiritaṭādhiṣṭhānenātiprakṛṣṭādṛṣṭacarendhananivahasambandhinā hutavahaviśeṣeṇa mahānasādau dhūmasya vā kiṃ sambandho dṛṣṭaḥ ?
analyzed: ati gahana giri taṭa adhiṣṭhānena ati prakṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa cara indhana nivaha sambandhinā hutavaha viśeṣeṇa mahānasa ādau dhūmasya vā kim sambandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
yena dhūma viśeṣa darśanāt giri śikhare tathāvidha agniḥ anumīyate

original: yādṛśo dhūmo yatrāvagataḥ tatraiva tādṛśas tatsampādanasamartho dṛṣtāntabhūmāv aparidṛṣṭo 'pi sāmānyavyāptibalena pakṣadharmatāvaśāt sidhyatīti
analyzed: yādṛśaḥ dhūmaḥ yatra avagataḥ tatra eva tādṛśaḥ tad sampādana samarthaḥ dṛṣtānta bhūmau a paridṛṣṭaḥ pi sāmānya vyāpti balena pakṣa dharma tā vaśāt sidhyati iti

original: tad idam asmābhir abhidhīyamānaṃ kim iti na hṛdayam adhirohati bhavatām /
analyzed: tat idam asmābhiḥ abhidhīyamānam kim iti na hṛdayam adhirohati bhavatām

original: ihāpi kāryatvaṃ samarthakartṛpūrvakatvena ghaṭādiṣu viditasambandhaniyamaṃ kṣtityādiṣu dṛśyamānaṃ svasampādanasamartham adṛṣṭapūrvam eva buddhimatkartāram  #
analyzed: iha api kāryatvam samartha kartṛ pūrvakatvena ghaṭa ādiṣu vidita sambandha niyamam kṣtiti ādiṣu dṛśyamānam sva sampādana samartham adṛṣṭa pūrvam eva buddhimat kartāram
upasthāpayati

original: yathaiva hi deśakālendhanaparimāṇādiviśeṣānādareṇa dhūmasya svodayānuguṇahutavahamātreṇa sambandhaniyamaḥ,
analyzed: yathā eva hi deśa kāla indhana parimāṇa ādi viśeṣa anādareṇa dhūmasya sva udaya anuguṇa hutavaha mātreṇa sambandha niyamaḥ
tathā eva anīśvara tva akiñcijjñatva śarīri tva puṇya pāpa paravaśa tvam anuṣya tva ādi viśeṣa prahāṇena

original: kāryasya svanirmāṇasamarthabuddhimatkartṛmātreṇa sambandhaniyamaniścaya iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: kāryasya sva nirmāṇa samartha buddhimat kartṛ mātreṇa sambandha niyama niścayaḥ iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: api ca vibhudravyasaṃyoginaḥ parispandavataś ca sarvatra sparśavattvāvyabhicāre 'pi jñānasukhādinityadravyaviśeṣaguṇānumitātmasaṃyogino manasaḥ  #
analyzed: api ca vibhu dravya saṃyoginaḥ parispandavataḥ ca sarvatra sparśavat tva avyabhicāre pi jñāna sukha ādi nitya dravya viśeṣa guṇa anumita ātma saṃyoginaḥ manasaḥ
katham iva sparśa rahita ta tvam

original: kathaṃ ca vāyavīyadravyasya mahimaguṇaśālino niyatādhiṣṭhānasparśanatvaniyamadarśane 'pi tvagindriye tadviparyayaḥ ?
analyzed: katham ca vāyavīya dravyasya mahima guṇa śālinaḥ niyata adhiṣṭhāna sparśana tva niyama darśane tvac indriye tad viparyayaḥ

original: taijasasya vā rūpasparśayor anyattarasya vā prākaṭyaniyame 'pi rūpopalambhasādhanatānumitataijasabhāvasya cakṣuṣo niyamena tadubhayānudbhavābhyupagamaḥ
analyzed: taijasasya vā rūpa sparśayoḥ anyattarasya vā prākaṭya niyame pi rūpa upalambha sādhana tā anumita taijasa bhāvasya cakṣuṣaḥ niyamena tad ubhaya anudbhava abhyupagamaḥ

original: atha kāryadarśanānumitasadbhāvānāṃ taijasādibhāve 'pi tattadviśeṣaṇāṃ yogyānupalabdhibādhitatvāt tadabhyupagame 'nekaniyamabhaṅgaprasaṅgāc
analyzed: atha kārya darśana anumita sadbhāvānām taijasa ādi bhāve pi tad tad viśeṣaṇām yogya anupalabdhi bādhita tvāt tad abhyupagame neka niyama bhaṅga prasaṅgāt

original: hanta tarhi prakṛtaviṣaye 'pi prasañjitadharmaviśeṣāṇām anupalambhabādhāviśeṣād anekaniyamadarśanavighātaprasaṅgāc ca tathābhyupagama iti sarvaṃ  #
analyzed: hanta tarhi prakṛta viṣaye pi prasañjita dharma viśeṣāṇām anupalambha bādhā viśeṣāt aneka niyama darśana vighāta prasaṅgāt ca tathā abhyupagamaḥ iti sarvam
samānam anyatra abhiniveśāt

acetana tvāt

original: tathā vivādādhyāsitā bāhyābhyantarapravṛttayaḥ prakṛtyupakaraṇapratyakṣapūrvikāḥ kāryatvāt tadvad eva /
analyzed: tathā vivāda adhyāsitāḥ bāhya abhyantara pravṛttayaḥ prakṛti upakaraṇa pratyakṣa pūrvikāḥ kārya tvāt tadvat eva
pratyakṣam tat prameya tvāt padārtha tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat
